com.qoppa.pdf.resources

Interface IImageResource


  • public interface IImageResource
    Representation of an image resource in a PDF document.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBitsPerComponent()
      Returns the number of bits per component.
      java.lang.String getColorSpace()
      Returns the name of the color space used for this image.
      java.lang.String getCompression()
      Return the compression used for this image.
      int getHeight()
      Return the height of the image, in pixels.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
      This method returns a BufferedImage object for the image embedded in the PDF document.
      int getNumComponents()
      Returns the number of color components in the image.
      int getWidth()
      Return the width of the image, in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
                                      throws PDFException
        This method returns a BufferedImage object for the image embedded in the PDF document.
        Returns:
        The image in the image resource.
        Throws:
        PDFException

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
             throws PDFException
        Return the width of the image, in pixels.
        Returns:
        The width of the image in pixels.
        Throws:
        PDFException

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
              throws PDFException
        Return the height of the image, in pixels.
        Returns:
        The height of the image in pixels.
        Throws:
        PDFException - if there is an error reading the image.

      • getCompression

        java.lang.String getCompression()
                                throws PDFException
        Return the compression used for this image. The string returned by this method is the internal PDF name for the image compression. Some common image compression methods:
        • DCTDecode - JPEG
        • JPXDecode - JPEG 2000
        • CCITTFaxDecode - CCITT Fax Group 3 or Group 4
        • JBIG2Decode - JBIG 2
        Returns:
        the name of the image compression
        Throws:
        PDFException - if there is an error reading the image.

      • getColorSpace

        java.lang.String getColorSpace()
                               throws PDFException
        Returns the name of the color space used for this image.
        Returns:
        the color space name for the image
        Throws:
        PDFException - if there is an error reading the image.

      • getNumComponents

        int getNumComponents()
                     throws PDFException
        Returns the number of color components in the image.
        Returns:
        the number of color components
        Throws:
        PDFException - if there is an error reading the image.

      • getBitsPerComponent

        int getBitsPerComponent()
                        throws PDFException
        Returns the number of bits per component.
        Returns:
        the number of bits per component.
        Throws:
        PDFException - if there is an error reading the image.
